comments.html:
Dear Ivan,

Thank you for this excellent article. It’s educated me very much. In it you wrote “ stomped the CRC on egress ports”. Could you elaborate on this sentence. It is not clear to me exactly what you mean.

Thank you.
comments.name: Mark Pawson

comments.html: Hi Mark! So nice to hear you like the article. For more details, follow the links in the paragraph starting with "For more details...". This might also help.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
